com.google.cloud.datastore.testing

Class RemoteDatastoreHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.datastore.testing.RemoteDatastoreHelper

  • public class RemoteDatastoreHelper
extends Object
    Utility to create a remote datastore configuration for testing. Datastore options can be obtained via the getOptions() method. Returned options use a randomly generated namespace (DatastoreOptions.getNamespace()) that can be used to run the tests. Once the tests are run, all entities in the namespace can be deleted using deleteNamespace(). Returned options also have custom ServiceOptions.getRetryParams(): RetryParams.getRetryMaxAttempts() is 10, RetryParams.getRetryMinAttempts() is 6, RetryParams.getMaxRetryDelayMillis() is 30000, RetryParams.getTotalRetryPeriodMillis() is 120000 and RetryParams.getInitialRetryDelayMillis() is 250. HttpServiceOptions.getConnectTimeout() and HttpServiceOptions.getReadTimeout() are both set to 60000.
